Name: Providing peer support services for veterans.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to providing peer support services for veterans.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Veterans

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 14 of the New York city charter is amended by adding a new subdivision e to read as follows:  
  	e. The office of veterans’ affairs shall establish a peer support hotline and other peer support services in partnership with veterans associations and organizations which service veterans.
    	§2.   This local law shall take effect ninety days after it shall have been enacted into law.
    
LS#1701
